thread.title: Arsenal news: Laurent Koscielny gets injured v Bayern Munich, Arsenal immediately concede twice | Metro News
thread.title_full: Arsenal news: Laurent Koscielny gets injured v Bayern Munich, Arsenal immediately concede twice | Metro News

author: George Bellshaw For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Arsenal news: Laurent Koscielny gets injured v Bayern Munich, Arsenal immediately concede twice | Metro News
text:
George Bellshaw for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 15 Feb 2017 9:03 pm Koscielny limped off (Picture: AFP/Getty) 
Arsenal suffered a major blow as Laurent Koscielny limped off with a hamstring injury against Bayern Munich. ‘How can Gibbs be captain?!’ Man Utd legend Roy Keane TEARS into Arsenal flops 
The French centre-back damaged his leg by overstretching when stopping a through ball reaching Robert Lewandowski. 
While he stopped the Poland international going clean through, he was forced off in what will be seen as a crushing blow for Arsene Wenger. 
Gabriel Paulista came on to replace him but Arsenal will no doubt miss the defender over what will likely be at least a few weeks out.
